definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: English-Chinese books of translations are not all perfect.
sentences.chinese: 華英對照的翻譯書，並非都是十全十美的。

sentences.english: If mand is a type of dog, this is perfect.
sentences.chinese: 如果曼德爾是一個類型的狗，這是十全十美的。

sentences.english: Some units and individuals are also full of luck.
sentences.chinese: 一些單位和個人還圖十全十美的吉祥之意。

sentences.english: In the world, there isn't a perfect person. The perfection is to admit imperfect.
sentences.chinese: 這個世界上沒有十全十美的人，完美就是承認不完美。

sentences.english: It was perfect, God is always some mortal Jalan will be the others.
sentences.chinese: 十全十美那是神，是凡人總會有些地方會惹着別人。
十全十美，你這可愛的寶貝。

sentences.english: Your emotions are your guiding light, but of course you aren't infallible.
sentences.chinese: 你的情緒是你的指路明燈，但你當然並非十全十美。

sentences.english: The boys were complemented on their neat turn-out.
sentences.chinese: 男孩子們穿上整潔的衣服算是十全十美了。

sentences.english: When she gives a dinner party, Alma always does it up brown.
sentences.chinese: 當阿爾瑪舉行晚宴時，她總是辦得十全十美。

sentences.english: He aims at perfection in everything he does.
sentences.chinese: 他做任何事情都力求十全十美。

sentences.english: This perfection you may, if you please, arrive at .
sentences.chinese: 只要你有志於此，這種十全十美的境界你可以達到。

sentences.english: “Nothing is totally good or totally bad, ” Wu says.
sentences.chinese: “沒有任何事物是十全十美或者十惡不赦的，”吳說。

definition: nobody is perfect/everyone has their defect
not all gold is sufficiently red (idiom); no-one is perfect
perfect and without blemish/flawless/to leave nothing to be desired
perfect (idiom); perfection/the best of all possible worlds/as good as it gets
after one's heart (idiom); gratifying and satisfactory/everything one could wish
(idiom) take care of everything; handle everything
as one wants/according to one's wishes/ruyi scepter, a symbol of power and good fortune
propitious wind throughout the journey (idiom)/plain sailing/to go smoothly/have a nice trip!
